QuestData.Title: Huln's War - Shadowsong
QuestData.Description:
Someone with whom I believe you are familiar commands in the battlefield below.
Jarod Shadowsong speaks highly of you, and has requested that you join him in battle.
He has plans to put an end to this fight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Jarod Shadowsong in the battlefield.
QuestData.RewardText: I am happy to see you, great ally.
